attributes.action: stop councils charging BRITISH TAX PAYERS stupid bin taxes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
stop councils charging ENGLISH TAX PAYERS stupid bin taxes
councils are currently fining people for putting their bin out early, taking it in late, leaving the lid open and not having the bin so many feet from the curb
this is completely stupid !! and they should be concentrating on real crime instead of charging the working class stupid fines !! what has happened to the sanity in this country ? my grandfather would turn in his grave if he was able to see what has happened to this country.. Gordon Brown must step in and stop this before all hell breaks loose !!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
